job.title: Software Engineer In Test
job.description: The location for this job is<br>Austin, TX (Remote until Covid)<br><br>Interview rounds<br>Hackerrank and 2 Rounds of Interview<br><br> <br>Need strong Testng, Selenium, Java Coding experience and Appium<br><br><br>Must have:<br><br><br>• Bachelors or Masters in CS or related degrees.<br><br><br>• Minimum of 6+ years with Master or 8+ years with Bachelors of hand on experience in software development in test automation, concurrent coding skills in Java.<br><br><br>• Test automation experience using open source technologies and/or in-house frameworks -- MUST<br><br><br>• Experience in API testing (SOAP and MicroServices).<br><br><br>• Experience in UI and Mobile Testing.<br><br><br>• Experience with test frameworks like Junit, TestNG.<br><br><br>• Familiarity with BDD and/or Cucumber<br><br><br>• Experience in Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment.<br><br><br>• Experience with code versioning tools (Git, SVN)<br><br><br>• Excellent knowledge SQL and ability to write complex queries to validate.<br><br><br>• Following Scrum/Agile development methodology.<br><br><br>• Strong application debugging skills.<br><br><br>• Experience with Jira or similar Agile process tools.<br><br><br>• Experience with using defect management and test management tools.<br><br><br>• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment where resourcefulness, determination, and strong problem-solving skills are necessary for success.<br><br><br>• Positive attitude and the ability to complete assigned objectives with minimal supervision.<br><br><br>• Excellent communications skills both written and verbal. <br><br><br> <br><br><br>Nice-to-have:<br><br><br>• Javascript and NodeJS, server-side experience is preferred.<br><br><br>• Experience with shell scripting<br><br><br>• Experience with Security Testing and/or ADA testing<br><br><br>
